content:
Sure, here's the menu in plain text:

============
Menu
=================

| Item | Ingredients | Price | Cost |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Gyro Tacos | Soft shell tacos, lamb gyro meat, tomato, onion, cucumber, feta cheese, tzatziki sauce | $8 | $2.50 |
| Greek Quesadilla | Flour tortilla, chicken or beef gyro meat, feta cheese, sautéed onions and bell peppers, hummus | $9 | $3.25 |
| Falafel Burrito | Flour tortilla, falafel, Mediterranean rice, lettuce, tomato, onion, feta cheese, chipotle tahini sauce | $10 | $2.75 |
| Greek Street Corn | Grilled corn on the cob, feta cheese spread, paprika, oregano | $5 | $1.25 |
| Lamb Souvlaki Wrap | Pita bread, lamb skewers, tomato, onion, cucumber, tzatziki sauce | $8 | $3.50 |
| Taco Pita | Pita bread, ground beef or chicken gyro meat, lettuce, tomato, onion, feta cheese, salsa | $9 | $2.75 |
| Greek Nachos | Pita chips, chicken gyro meat, feta cheese, hummus, tzatziki sauce | $10 | $2.75 |
| Mexican Greek Salad | Lettuce, tomato, cucumber, red onion, black olives, feta cheese, Greek dressing, tortilla strips | $7 | $2.25 |
| Spanakopita Quesadilla | Flour tortilla, spinach and feta cheese filling, tzatziki sauce | $8 | $2.75 |
| Baklava Churros | Churros, baklava filling, honey, cinnamon | $6 | $1.50 |

Note that the prices and costs listed are just for example purposes, and you should adjust them according to your own costs and pricing strategy.
